TableDefinition.Name: Human biomonitoring sample analyses
TableDefinition.Description: Contains the measurements of the samples of human biomonitoring studies.

ColumnDefinition.Description: Unique identification code of the sample analysis.
Code of the measured monitoring sample.
The code of method of analysis.

ColumnDefinition.Name: Substance concentration(s)
ColumnDefinition.Description: Substance concentrations can be uploaded via the sample concentrations table or via additional columns of the sample analyses table. For the latter, one or more columns with the measured concentrations of the substances in the unit as specified by the analytical method should be included in the data table. The column name(s) should match the substance codes of the substances measured by the analytical methods. Empty fields for substances that should have been measured by the analytical method are considered to be censored with measurement values below LOQ or LOD.
Name of the human monitoring sample analysis.
Additional description of the human monitoring sample analysis.
